channel.title: Ip ban
channel.description: when i put someones ip in the ip ban list, they can log in on a different account and go on it, and when they log off they get banned. Can anyone fix this so once i ip ban them they cant log in on any account?

item.title: Ip ban

item.description:
@deamerdude wrote:

when i put someones ip in the ip ban list, they can log in on a different account and go on it, and when they log off they get banned. Can anyone fix this so once i ip ban them they cant log in on any account?
